My name is Nghiem Huynh, pronounced 'Nim Hwin'. I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at Yale University.

I will be joining the Department of Economics at the University of Oklahoma as an Assistant Professor in July 2024.

My research focuses on Development Economics and International Trade.

Read more about my research [here](papers.qmd) and find my CV [here](Huynh_Nghiem_CV.pdf){target="_blank"}.

For potential collaborations or inquiries, please reach out at [nghiem.huynh\@yale.edu]{.underline}
